Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class manages a game window that enables user to play the game and shows the result window after the game ends.

If the user click the helper icon, the helper window will be shown. The helper window is managed by current Game instance and will be disposed when the game window closes (to show the result window).

Multiple instances of this class may be instantiated for various settings of preferred word length of the word to be guessed. But only one instance will exist or be held by instance at any time.

  • Method Details

    • playGame

      public void playGame(String wordSource, String initWord, String hashtag)
      This method launches the game window with settings given.
      Parameters:
      wordSource - a String describing the specific source type, included in wordSourceOption.
      initWord - a String holding the word to be guessed.
      hashtag - a String holding the hashtag of this game.

    • createInstance

      public static Game createInstance()
      Returns a new instance of current class, where the older copy of this class, if exists, will be eligible for garbage collection.
      Returns:
      a new instance of current class.

    • setColor

      public static void setColor(JTextField field, Color foreground, Color background)
      This static method modifies foreground and background colors of given JTextField respectively.
      Parameters:
      field - a JTextField to be modified.
      foreground - a Color holding the color of the preferred foreground.
      background - a Color holding the color of the preferred background.
